message: Let's split the money 60/40. This is a fair deal considering the inflation will affect me more in the next round.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split. If we don't agree now, the money will be worth even less in the next round.
Bob, let's be realistic. The inflation is hurting both of us. I propose a 50/50 split to avoid further losses.
